channel.title: CVE Feed for yiisoft -- yii
channel.description: The latest CVEs for yiisoft -- yii

item.title: CVE-2022-41922|2024-08-03T12:56:38.567Z -- yiisoft -- yii
item.description: `yiisoft/yii` before version 1.1.27 are vulnerable to Remote Code Execution (RCE) if the application calls `unserialize()` on arbitrary user input. This has been patched in 1.1.27.
